Issue.creator: adamludvik
Issue.summary: Fix intermittent namespace permissioning test failure
Issue.description: The namespace permissioning test fails intermittently with an urllib.error.HTTPError: HTTP Error 503 or 404. This is presumably because the test relies on some blocks being committed over a period of time while it sleeps. The test is in integration/sawtooth_integration/tests/test_namespace_permissioning.py. The test should be reworked to not use a sleep.
